No Poverty.reason: Course focuses on business communication skills; no content on poverty or economic alleviation.

Zero Hunger.reason: No coverage of food security or hunger-related topics.

Good Health and Well-being.reason: Indirectly supports well-being through improved communication skills and confidence, but health topics are not addressed.

Quality Education.reason: Core relevance through explicit focus on developing writing, oral communication, active listening, and critical thinking skills at university level.

Gender Equality.reason: No explicit coverage of gender equality issues in the syllabus.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: No content on energy or sustainability in energy systems.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Moderately relevant as business communication skills contribute to employability and workplace effectiveness.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: No explicit content on industrial innovation or infrastructure development.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: Indirectly supports equity by providing all students with communication skill development, but social inequality is not directly addressed.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: No relevance; urban planning or community sustainability not covered.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: Not addressed; course focuses on communication skills.

Climate Action.reason: No coverage of climate or environmental issues.

Life Below Water.reason: No content on marine or aquatic ecosystems.

Life on Land.reason: No coverage of terrestrial environmental or biodiversity issues.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: No direct focus on governance, justice, or institutional development.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: No mention of international or inter-institutional partnerships for sustainable development.
